phrases: B-But did not you say you have a boyfriend?
I made it up because you brought along such a pretty girlfriend.
Imai Miharuh Good job getting through that!
My little brother has his friends over, so we cannot go to my place.
I want to see her room!
Are you and your brother close?
But wait, she was trying to invite me over, right?
I have totally got a shot!
I can take her home instead!
I guess I was drunker than I thought.
Oh, I have water on me.
And she is being nicer to me now than she ever was when we were dating.
The thought of other guys getting in your pants is sheer torture!
Do taxis even come down this way?
You will never get a chance like this again.
Do you want to come over to my place now, maybe?
When hwill hhyou hhhget hhhhhere hhhhh?
When hwill hhyou hhhget hhhhhere hhhhh?
If you do not hurry up
I will charge you for an extension
Who does that girl think she is?
And that stupid virgin's pissing hme off, too!
Not like they will last more than three months, anyway

Receipt Kinoshita Kazuya-sama Rent-A-Girlfriend Itemized Bill Base Fee/hrhhhhhh 5000 yen x1 hChoice Fee (Rookie)hhhhhhhhh5000 yen x1 hhCosts (City Limits)hhhhhhhhhhhh2000 yen x1 Total: 12,000 yen + taxes
W-Wait, I was not implying anything by that!
Yeah, I want to show you some new fish!
It is not like I am being a creep because I am still not over you or anything!
But, you know, every time I see you at college,
and your legs are so sexy, and I...
I keep pining for something I will not get back.
I even hurt Mizuhara over it.
Then I jumped to conclusions, made a move,
got rejected again, and now she is patting my head...
But I just cannot help it!
Deep down, I still want her approval!
Have you sobered up a little now?
Anyway, that is one funny girl you are dating.
Just when I thought she was being awfully quiet, she had that outburst.
Does she have a few screws loose?
I find it hard to deal with someone who blows their lid over every little thing.
She is a tough type to hang with, and honestly, a little cringey.
Hey, there is nothing wrong with going by looks.
But you are a big boy now, so you should consider personality, too.
Mizuhara's not the kind of girl you think she is.
You are scaring me a little.
I still like you, to be honest.
It does not even bother me when you diss me in public.
I am just happy you are still talking to me.
I mean, I seriously wanted to be the one to make you happy... forever.
Hearing you badmouth Mizuhara does not sit right with me.
I am sure she hates me now.
But right now, I just want to see Mizuhara...
Or is she mad at me?
I kept pushing her to do things she did not want to, and then embarrassed her to boot.
Why would she ever want to see my face again?
I do not really know what to say.
I am not mad or anything.
Like I keep saying, I am a rental girlfriend.
How you choose to deal with me is up to you.
Of course your ex would be more important.
Did you manage to get back with her?
Hell, I even went and got on her bad side.
Getting all pathetic over something that is in the past...
I even dragged you into it and hurt you.
I really do not know what is wrong with me.
Not being able to let go shows how much you care.
Much better than a relationship you can easily forget.
Do you want to try continuing with the rentals?
Some nights, you may want to die if you do not have company,
and some goodbyes can only be healed by a See you again.
If you want, I can give you both.
One night, two days on the Izu Peninsula!
No better way to get to know one another, eh?
Well, uh, I am just wondering if I should really even be here.
Same group as last time and all.
Mami-chan probably does not want me around, though.
We probably should not invite Kazuya, huh?
Kazu-kun and his girlfriend should come along!
Is she not mad at me?
Do not worry about it, Kazu-kun.
you could not get Chizuru-chan to come?
YOU-Uh, well, this happened on such short notice, you know.
You better have made up with her, man.
Dear Kinoshita-sama, Thank you for your patronage.
I have not received the 17,000 yen extension fee from the other day.
Please enclose it in the attached envelope and mail it to me.
(P.S.: I paid the agency for you with my own money.)
Of course she would be nice to a customer, huh?
I cannot keep this up forever.
Well, it is between the two of you.
I know just how hard you fell for Mami-chan, but still,
you should really treat your current girlfriend right.
Of course I would want to treat her right... if she were really my girlfriend.
If you want, I can give you both.
Why did she go out of her way to say that?
Change into your swimsuits and meet up here in ten minutes.
What does she think about me and Mizuhara?
Does inviting us mean she does not mind us?
I need to find out how she really feels.
Even if I tell her I broke up with Mizuhara,
I am sure Gran will accept it if I have Mami-chan with me.
I need to get with Mami-chan on this trip.
I will leave my aimless rental life here in Izu!
Dating another girl within a month?
Is it to get back at me?
hI cannot believe he stood up to me for her.
I will make them break up for sure.
The guys are waiting for us, Mami.
I am starting to get excited!
I mean, we are at the beach!
I want to eat a Shimoda Burger!
How to get back with ex
Summer in the first year of college only comes once.
Not enjoying it would be an insult to life itself.
Wait, I will regret it forever if I do not look.
I would have liked to get two more angles.
We may have been drinking, but I should not have said all that.
I should not have said what I did
I did not know she was worrying about it.
She really is a nice girl.
We only went out for a month, but I made so many memories!
We went to an amusement park, to Skytree, and to Tokyo Dome.
We even kissed in the heat of a moment, just the once.
We even picked a name for our future kid.
We took a syllable each from both of our names
and decided to use it whether we had a boy or a girl.
And when I asked you how many kids you would like,
you said you wanted enough to fill up a soccer team.
H-Hey, the more the m-m-merrier, right?
Yeah, but my body has to keep up!
I am sure that would have been fun.
But your girlfriend is a nice girl, and you two seem very in love.
Maya can never be born now, huh?
It is not what you think.
I am paying her to be with me.
She and I have no future together.
I want to be with you...
Yeah, we are in international comms together.
I guess we both decided to take a post-exam holiday.
I know the other two from literature.
Nobody's realized that Ichinose is Mizuhara?
Wait, do not Kazuya and Ichinose-san know each other?
It is our first time speaking, is not it, Kazuya-san?
She must have been freaking out, too.
Mizuhara Chizuru's got nerves of steel.
What were you about to say?
Tell me the truth about you and your girlfriend.
Kazuya, we are playing to see who goes shopping.
I need to tell Mami-chan the truth if I want to know how she really feels.
Racks his brain in the restroom a lot
But if I tell them about the rental girlfriend thing...
I am so sorry I let this happen, Nagomi-san!
Y-Yeah, well, you are a virgin.
I would not be able to live after that!
Oh, sorry, I forgot to lock the door.
Did not you agree to stay away from me?!
My friends wanted to hit the beach, and I was forced to tag along.
I am not lending you any money.
What do you think I am?
Why did you say what you did last time?
I did not mean anything by it.
You seemed to be down in the dumps,
so I told you it was okay to rent a girlfriend to heal after getting dumped, is all.
So she was only saying that as a rental girlfriend.
But still, she is definitely a nice girl.
Well, uh, I am getting pretty cozy with Mami-chan right now.
I might actually have a chance.
You were just a rental girlfriend, so I did think it would be weird to say this...
But, hey, we are Wednesday partners and all, and you have been so nice to me.
I was a little worried you might take offense if I got back with Mami-chan.
Man, I really cannot thank you enough...
Let us get one thing straight!
Me and you are rental girlfriend and client!
I have zero interest in you!
I was just being nice to you out of pity!
Do not come talking to me about crap like that!
Talking to you fries my brain...
Hey, that is going too far.
I was trying to express my thanks.
What other choice do we have?!
What other choice do we have?!
I thought I would help you with shopping.
You left your phone back on the table.
Sheesh, boys are such lousy liars.
If she sees Ichinose in there,
she will realize that she and Mizuhara are the same person!
I left them at the beach.
Ah, so you can be forgetful at times?
Wait, why did you guys even come here?
You should have told me you invited her!
But was not she supposed to be busy with something?
She is from Shimoda, you see.
A-And she got some free time.
So I was like, want to meet up?
Kazuya, what were you and her doing in the restroom?
I told you your sex life would be ruined if you lost her virginity to her, did not I?!
No sex until she is confirmed your partner-for-life!
Why are you two so obsessed with this?!
Listen, just do not do it!
I am glad you are here.
I have been wanting to apologize about last time.
Oh, I am sorry about what I said, too.
I need to make a phone call!
This is a trip with friends, y'know?
Trying to show off to me?
This is why virgins are so damn cringey.
hI never want to see your face again!
Die in a fire, stupid couple!
You are the one who showed up as Mizuhara.
Besides, we could have avoided all this if you would just told them we would broken up already!
So you are from here, huh, Chizuru-chan?
Sh-She was a sheltered rich girl, and she is still a little frail because of it!
She does not know much about hangout spots and stuff.
So how did you two end up meeting, then?
I-I randomly hit on her in Shibuya!
Wow, you were surprisingly easy to win over!
How many more damned lies are you going to tell?!
I am going to go wash off all this sand.
Check out that girl with the black hair!
The one in the pink bikini?
She is a top-ranked beauty in anybody's eyes.
And I made her pretend to be my girlfriend again.
Paying her might not get me off the hook this time.
Once this trip's over, I will tell them.
I will tell Gran and these guys that we broke up.
I bet Mami-chan's totally disgusted with me.
Who calls their girlfriend to a trip with friends?
It should still be around here.
I am amazed you let your boyfriend go on a trip with girls.
Already a chief at her young age
I need your help with homework!
I might be taking the next step to adulthood.
Busy taking the next step to adulthood, apparently.
Little Kazuya's finally going to make it...
He is still going on about that?
